title: Necklace
name: Necklace
suitable: Daily wear, formal events, or as a statement piece for special occasions.
benefit: A piece of jewelry worn around the neck, often featuring a pendant or gemstones.
description: A versatile piece of jewelry that can range from delicate chains to bold statement pieces, worn around the neck to enhance an outfit or express personal style. Necklaces often feature pendants, gemstones, or intricate designs.
keybenefit: Enhances any outfit, offers versatility with various styles, and can express personal style or sentiment.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Earrings
name: Earrings
suitable: Perfect for all occasions, from casual outings to formal events, depending on the design.
benefit: Adornments worn on the ears, ranging from simple studs to elaborate dangling designs.
description: Accessories worn on the ears that come in various styles, such as studs, hoops, or dangly designs. Earrings can be simple for everyday wear or elaborate for special occasions, adding a touch of elegance or edge to any look.
keybenefit: Adds elegance or edge to your look, suitable for all occasions, and available in various styles to match any outfit.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Bracelet
name: Bracelet
suitable: Ideal for adding elegance to both casual and formal outfits.
benefit: A decorative band or chain worn around the wrist.
description: A piece of jewelry that encircles the wrist, available in various materials like metal, leather, or beads. Bracelets can be subtle or statement-making, often worn alone or stacked for a layered effect.
keybenefit: Versatile accessory that can be worn alone or stacked, offering a wide range of materials and designs to suit any style.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Ring
name: Ring
suitable: Suitable for daily wear, engagements, weddings, or as a fashion statement.
benefit: A circular band worn on the fingers, often symbolizing love, commitment, or fashion.
description: A circular band, typically made of metal, worn on the fingers. Rings are often used to signify love, commitment, or fashion, with designs ranging from simple bands to those adorned with diamonds or other gemstones.
keybenefit: Symbolizes love, commitment, or fashion, and comes in a variety of designs, from simple bands to elaborate gemstone settings.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Bangle
name: Bangle
suitable: Best for traditional outfits, festive occasions, or stacking for a trendy look.
benefit: A rigid bracelet, typically worn in multiples, and often made of metal or glass.
description: A solid, circular bracelet that slips over the hand and onto the wrist. Often worn in multiples, bangles can be made from materials like metal, wood, or glass and are popular in both traditional and modern jewelry collections.
keybenefit: Easy to wear and stylish, perfect for stacking, and adds a traditional or modern touch to your ensemble.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Pendant
name: Pendant
suitable: Suitable for personalizing your necklace, making it great for everyday wear or gifts.
benefit: A decorative charm that hangs from a necklace, adding a focal point.
description: A decorative charm or ornament that hangs from a necklace, serving as the focal point of the piece. Pendants can be simple or intricate, often featuring gemstones, engravings, or symbolic designs.
keybenefit: Serves as the focal point of a necklace, allowing for personal expression with various designs and symbols.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Brooch
name: Brooch
suitable: Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to formal attire or securing a scarf or shawl.
benefit: A decorative pin, often worn on clothing, that serves as both an accessory and a fastener.
description: A decorative pin, usually worn on clothing, that adds a stylish touch to an outfit. Brooches come in various shapes and sizes, often embellished with gemstones or intricate patterns, and can also serve a functional purpose, like securing a scarf.
keybenefit: Adds a stylish and sophisticated touch to clothing, can be both decorative and functional, and comes in diverse designs.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Anklet
name: Anklet
suitable: Suitable for casual and beachwear, adding a playful touch to your look.
benefit: A chain or band worn around the ankle, adding a touch of elegance to the feet.
description: A bracelet designed to be worn around the ankle, often delicate and adorned with small charms or beads. Anklets add a playful and elegant touch to summer or beachwear.
keybenefit: Provides a playful and elegant accessory for summer or beachwear, adding a delicate charm to the ankle.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Cufflinks
name: Cufflinks
suitable: Ideal for formal occasions, business meetings, or any event requiring a dress shirt.
benefit: Decorative fasteners used to secure the cuffs of dress shirts, often considered a symbol of sophistication.
description: Small, ornamental fasteners used to secure the cuffs of dress shirts. Cufflinks come in various designs, from classic to quirky, and are considered a sophisticated accessory for formal attire.
keybenefit: Offers a sophisticated touch to formal attire, available in classic and quirky designs, and secures dress shirt cuffs stylishly.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Tiara
name: Tiara
benefit: Suitable for weddings, pageants, or any event where you want to feel like royalty.
description: A crown-like piece of jewelry worn on the head, often associated with royalty, weddings, or special occasions. Tiaras are typically encrusted with gemstones and add a regal touch to any formal ensemble.
keybenefit: Adds a regal and elegant touch to formal occasions, often associated with royalty and special events, and can make the wearer feel special.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Choker
name: Choker
benefit: A close-fitting necklace worn around the neck, often made of fabric, metal, or leather.
suitable: Trendy, edgy looks, often worn with casual or evening outfits.
description: A snug-fitting necklace that sits high on the neck, often made from materials like fabric, metal, or leather. Chokers can be simple and understated or adorned with embellishments, making them a versatile accessory for both casual and formal outfits.
keybenefit: Versatile accessory suitable for both casual and formal outfits, can be simple or embellished, and adds an edgy or elegant touch to the neckline.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Charm Bracelet
name: Charm Bracelet
benefit: A bracelet featuring small trinkets or charms that represent personal memories or interests.
suitable: Ideal for personalizing your style, great for everyday wear or as a sentimental gift.
description: A bracelet that features small, decorative trinkets or charms, each representing personal memories, interests, or milestones. Charm bracelets are often worn as a form of self-expression and can be customized over time by adding new charms.
keybenefit: Personalizable jewelry that allows for self-expression, can be customized over time, and holds sentimental value with each added charm.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Cameo
name: Cameo
benefit: A piece of jewelry featuring a raised relief image, typically carved from materials like shell or stone.
suitable: Perfect for vintage or classical outfits, often worn for formal occasions.
description: A classic piece of jewelry featuring a raised relief image, typically of a profile or scene, carved from materials like shell, stone, or coral. Cameos are often set in brooches, necklaces, or rings and are treasured for their vintage and timeless appeal.
keybenefit: Timeless and vintage appeal, adds a classic touch to any outfit, and is often treasured as a collectible or heirloom.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Locket
name: Locket
benefit: A pendant that opens to reveal a small space used to store a photo or memento.
suitable: Keeping personal memories close, great for daily wear or as a meaningful gift.
description: A pendant that opens to reveal a small compartment, traditionally used to store a photograph, lock of hair, or other sentimental memento. Lockets are often worn close to the heart, symbolizing love and cherished memories.
keybenefit: Keeps personal memories close to the heart, symbolizes love and sentiment, and is a meaningful gift or personal keepsake.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.

title: Toe Ring
name: Toe Ring
benefit: A small ring worn on one of the toes, often seen in bohemian or beach fashion.
suitable: Best for summer, beachwear, or bohemian-inspired outfits.
description: A small, often simple ring worn on the toes, commonly associated with bohemian, beach, or summer fashion. Toe rings can be made from metal, beads, or other materials and are usually worn barefoot or with sandals.
keybenefit: Adds a playful and fashionable element to summer or beachwear, easy to wear, and enhances barefoot or sandal looks.
specialLine: The price of the item will vary depending on the quantity and demand of the product.
